description: Save the world from the darkness in this cute platformer. Meet lumo, a firefly that has lost his light. Help him catch the lumos and restore his powers to reach new heights, new areas, defeat foes, bosses and survive the darkened depths of the rift!
name: amazin' Lumo
intro: Save the animals from the darkness that has opened in the sky. Jump, shoot and dash through the mazes and levels and defeat the big bad from beyond.
